document.title: Technical Bulletins: The Business of Crime: Research Findings Reveal Economic Motives
document.abstract: This Technical Bulletin discusses the business of crime and advises that understanding crime as a business is paramount when public officials develop policies and programs designed to prevent or contain criminal activity.
